Under current rules, the assistant referees are positioned behind their own goal, which gives them an area of influence on the game. Uefa officials say they did not want to undermine the on-field officiating and want to reduce the chances of players colliding into the assistant referees; other reasons to position them behind the goal include their safety and the possibility of them being able to see a touch-back more easily.
